entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Flurries and a few local snow squalls ending this evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
